verses.verse: וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נֹ֖חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach Noah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav; and his sons וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem פְּר֥וּ <S%H6509><s%> pe-Ru unto them Be fruitful וּרְב֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> u-re-Vu and multiply וּמִלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> u-mil-'U and replenish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

וּמוֹרַאֲכֶ֤ם <S%H4172><s%> u-mo-ra-'a-Chem And the fear of you וְחִתְּכֶם֙ <S%H2844><s%> ve-chit-te-Chem and the dread of you יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh, become עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat shall be upon every beast הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the earth וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of and upon every fowl הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of the air בְּכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol everything אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that תִּרְמֹ֧שׂ <S%H7430><s%> tir-Mos upon all that moveth הָֽאֲדָמָ֛ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah [upon] the earth וּֽבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all דְּגֵ֥י <S%H1709><s%> de-Gei and upon all the fishes הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam of the sea בְּיֶדְכֶ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> be-yed-Chem into your hand נִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> nit-Ta-nu. are they delivered

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Every רֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <S%H7431><s%> Re-mes Every moving thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- that חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> Chai, that liveth לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah shall be meat כְּיֶ֣רֶק <S%H3418><s%> ke-Ye-rek for you even as the green עֵ֔שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev, herb נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti have I given לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> Kol. all

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- But בָּשָׂ֕ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar flesh בְּנַפְשׁ֥וֹ <S%H5315><s%> be-naf-Sho with the life דָמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mo thereof [which is] the blood לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. thereof shall ye not eat

וְאַ֨ךְ <S%H389><s%> ve-'Ach And surely אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּמְכֶ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> dim-Chem your blood לְנַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-sho-tei-Chem of your lives אֶדְרֹ֔שׁ <S%H1875><s%> 'ed-Rosh, will I require מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad at the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah of every beast אֶדְרְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <S%H1875><s%> 'ed-re-Shen-nu; will I require it וּמִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> u-mi-Yad and at the hand הָֽאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, of man מִיַּד֙ <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad at the hand אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of every man's אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv, brother אֶדְרֹ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> 'ed-Rosh will I require אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh the life הָֽאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> Ha-'a-Dam. of man

שֹׁפֵךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> sho-feCh Whoso sheddeth דַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> dam blood הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, man's בָּֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ba-'a-Dam by man דָּמ֣וֹ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mo shall his blood יִשָּׁפֵ֑ךְ <S%H8210><s%> yish-sha-Fech; be shed כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki in בְּצֶ֣לֶם <S%H6754><s%> be-Tze-lem for in the image אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam. he man

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you פְּר֣וּ <S%H6509><s%> pe-Ru And you be ye fruitful וּרְב֑וּ <S%H7235><s%> u-re-Vu; and multiply שִׁרְצ֥וּ <S%H8317><s%> shir-Tzu bring forth abundantly בָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz in the earth וּרְבוּ־ <S%H7235><s%> u-re-vu- and multiply בָֽהּ׃ Vah. ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach, unto Noah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav and to his sons אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. with him saying

וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni Myself הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵקִ֛ים <S%H6965><s%> me-Kim And I behold I establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; for וְאֶֽת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et and with זַרְעֲכֶ֖ם <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Chem with you and with your seed אַֽחֲרֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'A-cha-rei-Chem. after you

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et and with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every נֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh creature הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah And with every living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem, for בָּע֧וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ba-'of that [is] with you of the fowl בַּבְּהֵמָ֛ה <S%H929><s%> bab-be-he-Mah of the cattle וּֽבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and every חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat and of every beast הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; for מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all יֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Ei with you from all that go out הַתֵּבָ֔ה <S%H8392><s%> hat-te-Vah, of the ark לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol every חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat to every beast הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti And I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִי֙ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem, for וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall never יִכָּרֵ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> yik-ka-Ret be cut off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בָּשָׂ֛ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar with you neither shall all flesh ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again מִמֵּ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mi-Mei any more by the waters הַמַּבּ֑וּל <S%H3999><s%> ham-mab-Bul; of a flood וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- neither יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall there ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again מַבּ֖וּל <S%H3999><s%> mab-Bul neither shall there any more be a flood לְשַׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> le-sha-Chet to destroy הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise אֽוֹת־ <S%H226><s%> 'ot- This [is] the token הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni which I נֹתֵ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten, make בֵּינִי֙ <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H996><s%> u-Vei-nei-Chem, between וּבֵ֛ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh creature חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah between me and you and every living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; for לְדֹרֹ֖ת <S%H1755><s%> le-do-Rot generations עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. that [is] with you for perpetual

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קַשְׁתִּ֕י <S%H7198><s%> kash-Ti my bow נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti I do set בֶּֽעָנָ֑ן <S%H6051><s%> be-'a-Nan; in the cloud וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah shall be for לְא֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> le-'ot and it shall be for a token בְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit, of a covenant בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. between me and the earth

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall come בְּעַֽנְנִ֥י <S%H6049><s%> be-'an-Ni And it shall come to pass when I bring עָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan a cloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; over the earth וְנִרְאֲתָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-nir-'a-Tah shall be seen הַקֶּ֖שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> hak-Ke-shet that the bow בֶּעָנָֽן׃ <S%H6051><s%> be-'a-Nan. in the cloud

וְזָכַרְתִּ֣י <S%H2142><s%> ve-za-char-Ti And I will remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֗י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּינִי֙ <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni is between וּבֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H996><s%> u-Vei-nei-Chem, is between וּבֵ֛ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein is between כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh creature חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah which [is] between me and you and every living בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol of all בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar; of all flesh וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and never יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od shall no more הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim and the waters לְמַבּ֔וּל <S%H3999><s%> le-mab-Bul, become a flood לְשַׁחֵ֖ת <S%H7843><s%> le-sha-Chet to destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar. all flesh

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become הַקֶּ֖שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> hak-Ke-shet And the bow בֶּֽעָנָ֑ן <S%H6051><s%> be-'a-Nan; shall be in the cloud וּרְאִיתִ֗יהָ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Ti-ha, and I will look upon it לִזְכֹּר֙ <S%H2142><s%> liz-Kor that I may remember בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit covenant עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, the everlasting בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein between אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God וּבֵין֙ <S%H996><s%> u-Vein and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh creature חַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah, every living בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol of all בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar of all flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. that [is] upon the earth

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נֹ֑חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach; unto Noah זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise אֽוֹת־ <S%H226><s%> 'ot- This [is] the token הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֲקִמֹ֔תִי <S%H6965><s%> ha-ki-Mo-ti, which I have established בֵּינִ֕י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar between me and all flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. that [is] upon the earth פ Peh

וַיִּֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the sons נֹ֗חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach, of Noah הַיֹּֽצְאִים֙ <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-tze-'Im that went forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הַתֵּבָ֔ה <S%H8392><s%> hat-te-Vah, of the ark שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> shem were Shem וְחָ֣ם <S%H2526><s%> ve-Cham and Ham וָיָ֑פֶת <S%H3315><s%> va-Ya-fet; and Japheth וְחָ֕ם <S%H2526><s%> ve-Cham and Ham ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi [is] the father כְנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> che-Na-'an. of Canaan

שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah These [are] the three אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- sons נֹ֑חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach; of Noah וּמֵאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> u-me-'El-leh these נָֽפְצָ֥ה <S%H5310><s%> na-fe-Tzah overspread כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. and of them was the whole earth

וַיָּ֥חֶל <S%H2490><s%> vai-Ya-chel began נֹ֖חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach And Noah אִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'ish another הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah; land וַיִּטַּ֖ע <S%H5193><s%> vai-yit-Ta' and he planted כָּֽרֶם׃ <S%H3754><s%> Ka-rem. a vineyard
